A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never walked out of a Star Wars movie feeling so empty before\, and I've seen them all. All the characters\, new and old\, were cardboard\, boring\, and worst of all\, predictable\, in spite of all the things they were saying to each other\, all that terrible\, hollow dialogue. Star Wars used to be meaningful. Now\, it seems Disney has traded everything that the series was\, for cheap twists and senseless action\, catered to the lowest common denominator. I don't think I'll be returning for the next installment. Hugely disappointing.
